newsitem.title: HONG KONG: German jewel dealer robbed at Hong Kong airport.
newsitem.headline: German jewel dealer robbed at Hong Kong airport.

text.p: A German jewel dealer found unconscious in a washroom at Hong Kong airport was robbed of US$980,000 worth of diamonds hidden under his armpit, police said on Wednesday.
The victim, aged 56, was found late on Tuesday night shortly after he arrived in the British colony.
He regained consciousness after medical treatment and found his diamonds, carried in a pouch in his armpit, some US$450 of travellers' cheques, US$15,000 in cash and his credit cards had been stolen.
Police declined to name the victim or give further details.
